pkgmetadata.longdescription: Connect to Your IBM 'Acoustic' Data with 'R' // Authentication can be the most difficult part about working with a new API. 'ibmAcousticR' facilitates making a connection to the IBM 'Acoustic' email campaign management API and executing various queries. The IBM 'Acoustic' API documentation is available at https://developer.ibm.com/customer-engagement/docs/.
